code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'../styles/map.css';import map from"../assets/images/map.png";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Map=()=>{const[isZoomed,setIsZoomed]=useState(false);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"map-container ".concat(isZoomed?'zoomed':''),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:map,alt:"Localiza\xE7\xE3o do ISPTEC",className:"map-image",onClick:()=>setIsZoomed(!isZoomed)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn zoom-button",onClick:()=>setIsZoomed(!isZoomed),children:isZoomed?'Reduzir':'Ampliar'})]});};export default Map;
